QuestData.Title: Dangerous Discourse
QuestData.Description:
<The scroll's runes shift and change as you attempt to read it. At first glance, it appears illegible.
Similar scrolls have appeared all over the Temple of Purity.
Eridia will be interested in these.>
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Eridia within the Temple of Purity.
QuestData.RewardText:
These words... this voice...
How do I know this voice?
